channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Introduction (Slide 1-2) For this lesson, weâ€™re going to be talking primarily about Boolean logic, Boolean algebra and how that plays into computer science and the foundations of how important that is and the role it plays and what we do. So before we get started, and before we can talk about things such as Boolean logic, we need to know where it came from.
